section.48: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: Al-Agharr al-Muzani, who was one amongst the Companions (of the Holy Prophet) reported that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said:There is (at times) some sort of shade upon my heart, and I seek forgiveness from Allah a hundred times a day
